articles.author: Rhik Kundu
articles.title: India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor to become the basis of world trade: PM Modi | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India, the US, United Arab Emirates, and Saudi Arabia have proposed to build shipping and railway links that will link Europe and the Middle East to India
articles.content: New Delhi: The upcoming India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor will become the basis of world trade for hundreds of years to come, and history will remember that this corridor was initiated on In… [+2332 chars]

articles.author: NICOLE WINFIELD Associated Press, SYLVIE CORBET Associated Press, TRISHA THOMAS Associated Press
articles.title: Pope Francis insists Europe doesn't have a migrant emergency and challenges countries to open ports - ABC News
articles.description: Pope Francis is challenging French President Emmanuel Macron and other European leaders to open their ports to people fleeing hardship and poverty
